授業目的:
Artful Conversations: An Introduction to Looking at and Talking about Western Art

英文欄参照/Refer to the following:
到達目標: 英文欄参照/Refer to the following
特記事項:
この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。

本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
Classes will be taught face to face with possible on demand due to emergency situations.
Students will need a Gmail account to access Google Classroom.
IMPORTANT: You must have space in your Google Drive. If your Google Drive is full (15GB) of photos, videos, or other documents, you will not be able to see class material or assignments.

第1回:
Week 1:
Introduction & Explanation: (Google Classroom, Topic Discussion Leaders (TDL), Academic Conversations, and Presentations.) Discuss what is Creativity and Thinking Routines.
Example set: Theme: Boats & Trains. Thinking Routine (TR): Read-Know-Time How to do Technique (HT): Draw: Pencils, Chalk, & Charcoal TDL: Greek & Roman and Medieval Art & Byzantine
Prep for next week: Check the paper syllabus or one on Google Classroom.
第2回:
Week 2:
Theme: Religion & Myth. TR: Happen-Reason-If HT: Make Mosaics TDL: Romanesque & Gothic and Early Renaissance & Netherlandish
Prep for next week: Check the paper syllabus or one on Google Classroom.
第3回:
Week 3:
Theme: Self & Portrait. TR: First I Thought-Now I Think HT: Make Frescoes. TDL: High Renaissance & Mannerism and Baroque & Rocco
Prep for next week: Check the paper syllabus or one on Google Classroom.
第4回:
Week 4:
Theme: Play & Work. TR: Focus-Think-Wonder HT: Create Colors TDL: Neoclassicism & Romanticism and Realism & Impressionism
Prep for next week: Check the paper syllabus or one on Google Classroom.
第5回:
Week 5:
Theme: Youth & Adult. TR: Express-Support-Unsure HT: Paint with Pastels TDL: Naturalism & Post-Impressionism and Symbolism & Expressionism
Prep for next week: Check the paper syllabus or one on Google Classroom.
第6回:
Week 6:
Theme: Glory & Tragedy. TR: Like-Message-Find HT: Make Lithographs TDL: Art Nouveau & Cubism and Futurism & Dadaism
Prep for next week: Check the paper syllabus or one on Google Classroom.
第7回:
Week 7:
Theme: Music & Dance. TR: First I Thought-Now I Think, Focus-Think-Wonder, Express-Support-Unsure, Like-Message-Find. Paired Discussion Workshop
Prep for next week: Check the paper syllabus or one on Google Classroom.
第8回:
Week 8:
Theme: Colors & Lines. TR: Remind-Same-Different HT: Use Paper: Collages, Paper Mache, & Models TDL: New Objectivity & Precisionism and Art Deco & Bauhaus
Prep for next week: Check the paper syllabus or one on Google Classroom.
第9回:
Week 9:
Theme: Figure & Motion. TR: Colors-Shapes-Lines HT: Use Oil & Acrylic TDL: Surrealism & Abstract Expressionism and Pop Art & Op Art
Prep for next week: Check the paper syllabus or one on Google Classroom.
第10回:
Week 10:
Theme: Birth & Death. TR: One Word-One Phrase HT: Do Screen Printing TDL: Kinetic & Minimalism and Conceptual & Performance Art
Prep for next week: Check the paper syllabus or one on Google Classroom.
第11回:
Week 11:
Theme: Love & Pain. TR: Emotions-Relate-Lead HT: Make Digital Art TDL: Photorealism & Installation and Earth & Street Art
Prep for next week: Check the paper syllabus or one on Google Classroom.
第12回:
Week 12:
Theme: Day & Night. TR: One Word-One Phrase, Colors-Shapes-Lines, Remind-Same-Different, Emotions-Relate-Lead. Presentation Workshop
Prep for next week: Check the paper syllabus or one on Google Classroom.
第13回: Prep for next week: Check the paper syllabus or one on Google Classroom.
